channel.title: Argh
channel.description:
Well im getting annoyed now of my SELF
Can someone tell me were i can find xprate for like max hp so i can change it to99 please..
Or if someone can tell me how to fix that would be great.
Well when i had 200hp coz i made the stats to 200 my hp went to like 999999999 hp and i need to make it so it goes down not like 999999hp..
Please help me smart once out there!!

Does that mean that ring giving me 999999hp witch is called the Infhp?
Now do you understand abit what im on about?

item.title: Argh
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:4, topic:262777”]Descriptive threads please.

[quote author=jc22493 link=topic=347019.msg2672738#msg2672738 date=1234897321]
So your question basically is -
How do I change the XP on my server?

Go into your client class and search -

exprate

You should see some values; change those.
[/quote][/quote]

Read full topic
